cookingTips: Blend frozen berries and canned peaches with their juices for maximum fruit flavor and natural sweetness
Add honey gradually and adjust to taste; frozen berries can be tart so honey balances the flavor
Serve immediately for best texture; if too thick, add fruit juice or water to reach desired consistency
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help me make a simple and intense fruit smoothie by blending frozen berries, canned peaches, and honey until smooth and creamy.
